Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $12000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an early-bird special price of $10800. This represents a significant saving of $1200 compared to the standard retail price. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to enhance your experience with our top-tier solution. If you're interested, please let me know promptly so we can finalize the details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
